docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: NOT LONG AFTER DICK THORNBURGH assumed control of the Department of Justice from his embattled predecessor, Edwin L. Meese 3d, he summoned the agency's employees to hear what he expected of them. The language was blunt: ''no surprises,'' no ''counterproductive confusion,'' no ''giving aid and comfort to our adversaries and ill-wishers.
